US welcomes Russia's Navalny being located, concerned for his well-beingThe United States welcomed reports on Monday that jailed Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny had been located but remained "deeply concerned" about his well-being, the U.S. State Department said, calling for his immediate release. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 19:40:52 GMT UYCTXMAZTRLXLM7KQGVJO27LRU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-welcomes-Russias-navalny-being- located-concerned-his-well-being-2023-12-25/Kanishka Singh世界
At least 113 killed in attacks in central Nigeria, local official saysThe death toll in weekend attacks in the central Nigerian state of Plateau has risen to 113, a local official said on Monday, in a region where clashes between herders and farmers are common. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 18:35:38 GMT ZHXIXKDMSRNCDPXJ4W5YCD3KPM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-113-killed-attacks-central-nigeria-local-official-2023-12-25/Reuters世界非洲
Plane passengers held pending human trafficking inquiry leave France for IndiaA plane carrying 276 Indian passengers took off on Monday for Mumbai, the French interior ministry's local office said, after it was grounded for four days pending investigation into possible human trafficking. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:25:18 GMT UUKLA3RZGNNVLN7MYZRS7RXE2I https://www.reuters.com/world/plane-passengers-held-pending- human-trafficking-inquiry-leave-france-india-2023-12-25/Reuters世界
Russian-backed union signs free trade pact with IranMembers of the Russian-led Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) have signed a fully-fledged free trade agreement with Iran, Russia's economy ministry and the EEU said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:19:44 GMT LKJFXPAGDZI3JNSNFM3ABVGQOY https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-backed-union-signs-free-trade-pact-with-iran-2023-12-25/Reuters世界
Ukraine seeks to terminate free trade deal with BelarusUkraine's government has proposed to parliament terminating a free trade agreement with Belarus, which supports Russia's invasion of Ukraine that began in February 2022, cabinet minister Taras Melnychuk said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:11:01 GMT 5BCTW4Z3FNKSXH4KLBON6WVHOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-seeks-terminate-free-trade-deal-with-belarus-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Two Kuwaitis kidnapped on Iraqi desert hunting trip, officials saySecurity forces are searching for two Kuwaitis who were kidnapped while on a hunting trip in a desert area in Iraq, two security officials said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:05:53 GMT PCJXNLKGHFN3RDB2SEPFHSZYTA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/two-kuwaiti-nationals-kidnapped-iraqi-desert-security-officials-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东
Russian forces gain control of Maryinka in east Ukraine, defence minister saysIt is one of Russia's most significant gains since the capture of Bakhmut in May. Most accounts of Maryinka, southwest of the Russian-held regional centre of Donetsk, describe it as a ghost town. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:59:48 GMT RROJQK7MMZPQPGQPLDUDQXVURI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-forces-gain-control-maryinka-east-ukraine-defence-minister-says-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli airstrike in Syria kills senior Iranian Revolutionary Guards memberAn Israeli airstrike outside the Syrian capital Damascus on Monday killed a senior adviser in Iran's Revolutionary Guards, three security sources and Iranian state media said. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:49:47 GMT JPVL4NZZ3JJTNGO5WASYQNPXTI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-air-strike-syria-kills-senior-iranian-revolutionary-guards-member-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东
UK's King Charles urges compassion, care for environment in time of conflictBritain's King Charles called on people on Monday to help those less fortunate during a time of economic hardship and global conflict, using his Christmas Day message to emphasise the importance of kindness, compassion and care for the environment. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:12:19 GMT RZVARTPYZRMLXHHNIRSKW7EJFU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-king-charles-urges-compassion-care-environment-time-conflict-2023-12-25/Reuters世界英国
Hamas, Islamic Jihad reject Gaza gov. overhaul for permanent ceasefire, Egyptian sources sayHamas and the allied Islamic Jihad have rejected an Egyptian proposal that they relinquish power in the Gaza Strip in return for a permanent ceasefire, two Egyptian security sources told Reuters on Monday. Russia's Navalny tracked down to 'Polar Wolf' prison in the ArcticJailed Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny has been tracked down to a penal colony north of the Arctic Circle, his spokeswoman said on Monday, after supporters lost touch with him for more than two weeks. Thousands protest over Serbia election result, march to main police stationSeveral thousand people gathered in front of the central election commission building in Belgrade on Monday to protest over an election earlier this month that international monitors said was unfair. Indian army orders inquiry into alleged civilian deaths in custodyThe Indian army has launched an investigation into the deaths of three civilians allegedly in military custody in Indian Kashmir, and moved senior officers from the disputed area, a military official said on Monday. Christmas in China brings glittering decor and foreign influence concernsGiant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question. Russia, Ukraine report six civilians killed in attacks on Kherson, HorlivkaWhile Moscow and Kyiv deny targeting civilians in the war that Russia launched on Ukraine in February 2022, both sides have carried out numerous strikes on each other's infrastructure that is critical to their militaries. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 00:24:48 GMT Y3MXD4DOKBNTNEMWDXEK2VGLIA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-ukraine-report-six-civilians-killed-attacks-kherson-horlivka-2023-12-25/Maria Starkova世界欧洲
Israel's Netanyahu vows no let-up in war against Hamas as Gaza deaths mountLocal residents and Palestinian media said Israel stepped up air and ground shelling against al-Bureij refugee camp in central Gaza. At least 70 people were killed in an Israeli air strike targeting the Maghazi refugee camp, a Palestinian health ministry spokesperson said. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 23:28:23 GMT BQFD3UWPNBM2RCPVOMACE6ETMI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-airstrikes-kill-dozens-gaza-officials-say-christmas-bloodshed-2023-12-24/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Emily Rose世界中东
